snippet: The job cuts, said to affect 500 employees, are part of a corporate restructuring as the company is spun off from its parent, Time Warner.
abstract: Magazine giant Time Inc begins new round of layoffs as part of a companywide restructuring that will result in loss of about 500 jobs; cuts are announced as Time Inc prepares to be spun off from its parent company, Time Warner.
lead_paragraph: The job cuts, said to affect 500 employees, are part of a corporate restructuring as the company is spun off from its parent, Time Warner.

headline.main: Time Inc. to Cut 500 Jobs Ahead of Spinoff
headline.print_headline: Time Inc. to Cut 500 Jobs Ahead of Spinoff
